description: The Vermillion Homeroom Teacher is Goh and Chloe Cerise teacher in Vermilion City. Realizing that Regina might be in trouble for freezing Ash Ketchum, Goh and Chloe Cerise because she was meeting with the teacher in private, they tried to say it wasn`t her fault but the teacher wasn`t getting Regina in trouble and was just telling her about the school in detail as she was a new student.
name: Tannin
